item.description:
Join fellow Boston area webloggers for conversation, food and drinks.

Bring your ID. Grendel's Den is a 21+ venue. There is no WiFi but you might find an open network nearby if the signal is strong enough. (Grendel's is on the basement level.) Food is 1/2 off until 7:30 PM with a minimum $3.00 beverage purchase.

group.name: The Greater Boston Area Weblogger Meetup Group

item.name: December Boston Blog Meetup
